pages.text: Portable braziers are carried in inventory and can open in hand. It's only use is to thaw $(l:resting/aspics)aspics$(/l) into soup.
There are input slot, water bowl slot, output slot and fuel slot in the Portable Brazier. Though water is not required in stew pots to thaw aspics, this would need a bowl of water to do so.
Portable braziers consume a fuel item per work. It accepts vivid charcoal and magma cream as fuel.
Vivid charcoal is cheaper than magma cream, and it's only for fuel in portable braziers
